original_text: I saw that the woman was like a drunk. She was like someone who had drunk the blood of God's people. She had killed them because they had told other people about Jesus. When I saw her, I was very surprised.
korean_text: 또 내가 보매 이 여자가 성도들의 피와 예수의 증인들의 피에 취한지라 내가 그 여자를 보고 놀랍게 여기고 크게 놀랍게 여기니

sentences.original_text: I saw that the woman was like a drunk.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 여자가 취한 사람 같은 것을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: She was like someone who had drunk the blood of God's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 하나님의 백성의 피를 마신 사람 같았습니다.

sentences.original_text: because they had told other people about Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 다른 사람들에게 예수님에 대해 이야기했기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: When I saw her, I was very surprised.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그녀를 보았을 때, 나는 매우 놀랐습니다.
